35 
36 class ArmCommander:
37  """
38  Object which set the arm goals to MoveIt
39  """
40 
41  def __init__(self, arm_state):
42  rospy.logdebug("Arm Commander - Entering in Init")
43  self.__arm_state = arm_state
44  self.__joints_name = self.__arm_state.joints_name
45 
46  # -- Commanders
47  # - Move It Commander
48  self.__arm = self.__arm_state.arm
49  self.__end_effector_link = self.__arm.get_end_effector_link()
50 
51  # Executor
52  self.__traj_executor = TrajectoriesExecutor(self.__arm)
53  self.__traj_manager = TrajectoryHandlerNode(self.__arm_state, self.__traj_executor)
54 
55  # Validation
56  self.__parameters_validator = self.__arm_state.parameters_validator
57 
58  # - Frames managers
59  self.__transform_handler = self.__arm_state.transform_handler
60  self.__kinematics_handler = self.__arm_state.kinematics
61 
62  # Jog Controller
63  self.__jog_controller = JogController(self.__arm_state)
64 
65  @property
66  def trajectories_executor(self):
67  return self.__traj_executor
68 
69  # - PTP Trajectory
70  def set_joint_target(self, arm_cmd):
71  """
72  Set controller target to a joint target
73  Then execute the trajectory to the target
74  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
75  :type : ArmMoveCommand
76  :return: status, message
77  """
78  joints = list(arm_cmd.joints)
79  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.JOINTS, joints)
80  self.__check_collision_in_joints_target(joints)
81 
82  return self.__set_joint_target_moveit(joints)
83 
84  def __set_joint_target_moveit(self, joints):
85  """
86  Set MoveIt target to a joint target
87  Then execute the trajectory to the target
88  :param joints: joints list
89  :type : list[float]
90  :return: status, message
91  """
92  self.__arm.set_joint_value_target(joints)
93  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_plan_to_target()
94 
95  def set_pose_target_from_cmd(self, arm_cmd):
96  """
97  Set MoveIt target to a pose target with RPY
98  Then execute the trajectory to the target
99  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
100  :type : ArmMoveCommand
101  :return: status, message
102  """
103  x, y, z = arm_cmd.position.x, arm_cmd.position.y, arm_cmd.position.z
104  roll, pitch, yaw = arm_cmd.rpy.roll, arm_cmd.rpy.pitch, arm_cmd.rpy.yaw
105  return self.__set_pose_target_moveit(x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw)
106 
107  def __set_pose_target_moveit(self, x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw):
108  tcp_pose = list_to_pose([x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw])
109  self.__transform_handler.display_target_pose(tcp_pose)
110 
111  ee_pose = self.__transform_handler.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(tcp_pose, self.__end_effector_link)
112  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.POSE_QUAT, ee_pose.position, ee_pose.orientation)
113 
114  self.__arm.set_pose_target(ee_pose, self.__end_effector_link)
115 
116  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_plan_to_target()
117 
118  def set_position_target(self, arm_cmd):
119  """
120  Set MoveIt target to a position target
121  Then execute the trajectory to the target
122  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
123  :type : ArmMoveCommand
124  :return: status, message
125  """
126  ee_position = self.__transform_handler.tcp_to_ee_link_position_target(arm_cmd.position,
127  self.__end_effector_link)
128  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.POSITION, ee_position)
129 
130  x, y, z = ee_position.x, ee_position.y, ee_position.z
131  self.__arm.set_position_target([x, y, z], self.__end_effector_link)
132  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_plan_to_target()
133 
134  def set_rpy_target(self, arm_cmd):
135  """
136  Set MoveIt target to a rpy target
137  Then execute the trajectory to the target
138  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
139  :type : ArmMoveCommand
140  :return: status, message
141  """
142  tcp_roll, tcp_pitch, tcp_yaw = (
143  arm_cmd.rpy.roll,
144  arm_cmd.rpy.pitch,
145  arm_cmd.rpy.yaw,
146  )
147  ee_roll, ee_pitch, ee_yaw = self.__transform_handler.tcp_to_ee_link_rpy_target(
148  tcp_roll, tcp_pitch, tcp_yaw, self.__end_effector_link
149  )
150  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.RPY, RPY(ee_roll, ee_pitch, ee_yaw))
151  self.__arm.set_rpy_target([ee_roll, ee_pitch, ee_yaw], self.__end_effector_link)
152  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_plan_to_target()
153 
154  def set_pose_quat_target(self, arm_cmd):
155  """
156  Set MoveIt target to a Pose target with quaternion
157  Then execute the trajectory to the target
158  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
159  :type : ArmMoveCommand
160  :return: status, message
161  """
162  tcp_pose = Pose(arm_cmd.position, arm_cmd.orientation)
163  self.__transform_handler.display_target_pose(tcp_pose)
164  ee_pose = self.__transform_handler.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(tcp_pose, self.__end_effector_link)
165  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.POSE_QUAT, ee_pose.position, ee_pose.orientation)
166  self.__arm.set_pose_target(ee_pose, self.__end_effector_link)
167  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_plan_to_target()
168 
169  def set_pose_quat_from_pose(self, pose):
170  """
171  Set MoveIt target to a Pose target with quaternion
172  Then execute the trajectory to the target
173  :param pose: Pose message containing target values
174  :type : Pose
175  :return: status, message
176  """
177  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.POSE_QUAT, pose.position, pose.orientation)
178  ee_pose = self.__transform_handler.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(pose, self.__end_effector_link)
179  self.__arm.set_pose_target(ee_pose, self.__end_effector_link)
180  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_plan_to_target()
181 
182  # - Shift Trajectory
183  def set_shift_pose_target(self, arm_cmd):
184  """
185  Set MoveIt target to a shifted target from actual position
186  Then execute the trajectory to the target
187  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
188  :type : ArmMoveCommand
189  :return: status, message
190  """
191  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.SHIFT_POSE, arm_cmd.shift)
192  self.__arm.shift_pose_target(arm_cmd.shift.axis_number, arm_cmd.shift.value, self.__end_effector_link)
193  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_plan_to_target()
194 
195  def set_shift_linear_pose_target(self, arm_cmd):
196  """
197  Set MoveIt target to a shifted target from actual position
198  Then execute the cartesian trajectory to the target
199  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
200  :type : ArmMoveCommand
201  :return: status, message
202  """
203  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.SHIFT_LINEAR_POSE, arm_cmd.shift)
204 
205  axis_number = arm_cmd.shift.axis_number
206  shift_value = arm_cmd.shift.value
207 
208  # Get current end effector pose
209  actual_pose = self.__arm.get_current_pose().pose
210 
211  # Get list [x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw] from pose stamped
212  pose_list = pose_to_list(actual_pose)
213 
214  # Apply shift on pose
215  pose_list[axis_number] += shift_value
216 
217  # Get pose stamped from target pose
218  msg_pose = list_to_pose(pose_list)
219 
220  # Check if command is really close to the current position
221  if poses_too_close(msg_pose, actual_pose):
222  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Command was already satisfied"
223 
224  # set arm pose target
225  self.__arm.set_pose_target(pose_list, self.__end_effector_link)
226  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_cartesian_plan(
227  [msg_pose],
228  self.__arm_state.velocity_scaling_factor,
229  self.__arm_state.acceleration_scaling_factor,
230  )
231 
232  # - Linear Trajectory
233  def set_linear_trajectory(self, arm_cmd):
234  """
235  Set MoveIt target to a Pose target with RPY
236  Then execute a Linear trajectory to the target
237  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
238  :type : ArmMoveCommand
239  :return: status, message
240  """
241  x, y, z = arm_cmd.position.x, arm_cmd.position.y, arm_cmd.position.z
242  roll, pitch, yaw = arm_cmd.rpy.roll, arm_cmd.rpy.pitch, arm_cmd.rpy.yaw
243  x_q, y_q, z_q, w_q = quaternion_from_euler(roll, pitch, yaw)
244  tcp_pose = Pose(Point(x, y, z), Quaternion(x_q, y_q, z_q, w_q))
245  self.__transform_handler.display_target_pose(tcp_pose)
246  ee_pose = self.__transform_handler.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(tcp_pose, self.__end_effector_link)
247 
248  current_pose = self.__arm.get_current_pose().pose
249 
250  # If the goal is really close to the current pose,
251  # avoid useless calculations and return immediately
252  if poses_too_close(ee_pose, current_pose):
253  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Command was already satisfied"
254 
255  else:
256  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_cartesian_plan(
257  [ee_pose],
258  self.__arm_state.velocity_scaling_factor,
259  self.__arm_state.acceleration_scaling_factor,
260  )
261 
262  # - Spiral Trajectory
263  def draw_spiral_trajectory(self, arm_cmd):
264  """
265  Generate waypoints to draw a spiral and generate a cartesian path with these waypoints
266  Then execute the trajectory plan
267 
268  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
269  :type : ArmMoveCommand
270  :return: status, message
271  """
272  min_radius = 0.003
273  radius, angle_step, total_steps, plan = [float(arg) for arg in arm_cmd.args]
274 
275  center_position = self.__arm.get_current_pose().pose.position
276  target_pose = self.__arm.get_current_pose().pose
277 
278  waypoints = []
279  angle_step_rad = math.radians(angle_step)
280  angle = 0
281  for i in range(2):
282  for dist_from_center in np.linspace(0, float(radius), num=total_steps):
283  if i == 1:
284  dist_from_center = radius - dist_from_center
285  dist_from_center += min_radius
286 
287  if plan == 1:
288  y_offset = dist_from_center * math.cos(angle)
289  z_offset = dist_from_center * math.sin(angle)
290  target_pose.position.y = center_position.y + y_offset
291  target_pose.position.z = center_position.z + z_offset
292  elif plan == 2:
293  x_offset = dist_from_center * math.cos(angle)
294  z_offset = dist_from_center * math.sin(angle)
295  target_pose.position.x = center_position.x + x_offset
296  target_pose.position.z = center_position.z + z_offset
297  elif plan == 3:
298  x_offset = dist_from_center * math.cos(angle)
299  y_offset = dist_from_center * math.sin(angle)
300  target_pose.position.x = center_position.x + x_offset
301  target_pose.position.y = center_position.y + y_offset
302  else:
303  rospy.logwarn("Spiral planer: bad plan parameter, must be between 1 and 3: "
304  "[1 = yz plan, 2 = xz plan, 3 = xy plan]")
305  raise ArmCommanderException
306 
307  waypoints.append(copy.deepcopy(target_pose))
308  angle += angle_step_rad
309 
310  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_cartesian_plan(
311  waypoints,
312  self.__arm_state.velocity_scaling_factor,
313  self.__arm_state.acceleration_scaling_factor,
314  )
315 
316  def draw_circle_trajectory(self, arm_cmd):
317  """
318  Generate waypoints to draw a circle and generate a cartesian path with these waypoints
319  Then execute the trajectory plan
320 
321  :param arm_cmd: ArmMoveCommand message containing target values
322  :type : ArmMoveCommand
323  :return: status, message
324  """
325  target_pose = self.__arm.get_current_pose().pose
326  center_point = arm_cmd.position
327  dist_from_center = dist_2_points(target_pose.position, center_point)
328 
329  tmp_point = Point(
330  round(target_pose.position.x - center_point.x, 4),
331  round(target_pose.position.y - center_point.y, 4),
332  round(target_pose.position.z - center_point.z, 4),
333  )
334 
335  angle_off = angle_between_2_points(Point(0, 1, 0), tmp_point)
336 
337  waypoints = []
338  angle_steps = 3
339  for angle in range(0, 360 + angle_steps, angle_steps):
340  angle_rad = math.radians(-angle) + angle_off
341  y_offset = dist_from_center * math.cos(angle_rad)
342  z_offset = dist_from_center * math.sin(angle_rad)
343  target_pose.position.y = center_point.y + y_offset
344  target_pose.position.z = center_point.z + z_offset
345  waypoints.append(copy.deepcopy(target_pose))
346  return self.__traj_executor.compute_and_execute_cartesian_plan(waypoints)
347 
348  # - Waypointed Trajectory
349  def execute_waypointed_trajectory(self, arm_cmd):
350  self.__validate_params_move(ArmMoveCommand.EXECUTE_FULL_TRAJ, arm_cmd.trajectory)
351  return self.__traj_executor.execute_joint_trajectory(arm_cmd.trajectory)
352 
353  def execute_raw_waypointed_trajectory(self, arm_cmd):
354  # go to start pose # move_joints
355  self.__arm.set_joint_value_target(arm_cmd.trajectory.joint_trajectory.points[0].positions)
356  # plan = self.__traj_executor.plan(arm_cmd.trajectory)
357  # return self.__traj_executor.execute_plan(plan)
358  return self.__traj_executor.execute_plan(arm_cmd.trajectory)
359 
360  def compute_and_execute_waypointed_trajectory(self, arm_cmd):
361  try:
362  status, message, plan = self.compute_waypointed_trajectory(arm_cmd)
363  except ArmCommanderException as e:
364  return e.status, e.message
365 
366  if status != CommandStatus.SUCCESS:
367  return status, message
368 
369  return self.__traj_executor.execute_plan(plan)
370 
371  def compute_waypointed_trajectory(self, arm_cmd):
372  """
373  Version 1 : Go to first pose using "classic" trajectory then compute cartesian path between all points
374  Version 2 : Going to all poses one by one using "classical way"
375  Version 3 : Generate all plans, merge them & smooth transitions
376  """
377  list_tcp_poses = arm_cmd.list_poses
378  if len(list_tcp_poses) == 0:
379  return (
380  CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE,
381  "Can't generate plan from a list of length 0",
382  None,
383  )
384  list_ee_poses = [
385  self.__transform_handler.tcp_to_ee_link_pose_target(tcp_pose, self.__end_effector_link)
386  for tcp_pose in list_tcp_poses
387  ]
388 
389  dist_smoothing = arm_cmd.dist_smoothing
390 
391  if dist_smoothing == 0.0:
392  # We are going to the initial pose using "classical" method
393  try:
394  plan = self.__traj_executor.compute_cartesian_plan(list_ee_poses)
395  if plan is None:
396  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE, "")
397  plan = self.__traj_executor.retime_plan(
398  plan,
399  self.__arm_state.velocity_scaling_factor,
400  self.__arm_state.acceleration_scaling_factor,
401  optimize=False,
402  )
403 
404  except ArmCommanderException as e:
405  if e.status == CommandStatus.NO_PLAN_AVAILABLE:
406  rospy.loginfo("Cartesian path computation failed, let's try another way!")
407  plan = self.__compute_trajectory(list_ee_poses, dist_smoothing=dist_smoothing)
408  else:
409  raise e
410  else:
411  plan = self.__compute_trajectory(list_ee_poses, dist_smoothing=dist_smoothing)
412 
413  return CommandStatus.SUCCESS, "Trajectory is Good!", plan
414 
415  def __compute_trajectory(self, list_poses, dist_smoothing=0.01):
416  """
417  Hard try to to smooth Trajectories, not really working at the moment
418  :param list_poses: list of Pose object
419  :param dist_smoothing: smoothing distance
420  :return: None
421  """
422  self.__arm.set_start_state_to_current_state()
423 
424  list_plans = []
425  new_state = RobotStateMoveIt()
426  new_state.joint_state.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
427  new_state.joint_state.name = self.__joints_name
428  new_state.joint_state.position = self.__arm.get_current_joint_values()
429 
430  for i, pose_target in enumerate(list_poses):
431  # Getting plan to target
432  # Try a linear path first
433  partial_plan = self.__traj_executor.compute_cartesian_plan([pose_target])
434  if not partial_plan: # Try a PTP path if linear path failed
435  rospy.loginfo("Linear path not found between {} joints and {} pose".format(
436  new_state.joint_state.position, pose_to_list(pose_target)))
437  self.__arm.set_pose_target(pose_target, self.__end_effector_link)
438  try:
439  partial_plan = self.__traj_executor.plan()
440  except ArmCommanderException as e:
441  self.__arm.set_start_state_to_current_state()
442  raise e
443 
444  list_plans.append(copy.deepcopy(partial_plan))
445 
446  # Generating new start state for future iteration
447  new_state.joint_state.position = (list_plans[-1].joint_trajectory.points[-1].positions)
448  self.__arm.set_start_state(new_state)
449 
450  self.__arm.set_start_state_to_current_state()
451  if dist_smoothing > 0:
452  plan = self.__link_plans_with_smoothing(dist_smoothing, *list_plans)
453  else:
454  plan = self.__traj_executor.link_plans(*list_plans)
455  self.display_traj(plan, id_=int(1000 * dist_smoothing))
456  return plan
457 
458  def __link_plans_with_smoothing(self, dist_smoothing=0.0, *plans):
459  """
460  Link plans together with a smooth transition between each of them
461  """
462 
463  def find_limit_point(plan_, dist_smooth, reverse):
464  len_plan = len(plan_.joint_trajectory.points)
465  ind_ref = -1 if reverse else 0
466  reference_pos = self.__kinematics_handler.get_forward_kinematics(
467  plan_.joint_trajectory.points[ind_ref].positions)
468  if reference_pos is None:
469  reference_pos = RobotState()
470  for raw_ind in range(1, len_plan):
471  if reverse:
472  ind = len_plan - raw_ind - 1
473  else:
474  ind = raw_ind
475  pose_i = self.__kinematics_handler.get_forward_kinematics(plan_.joint_trajectory.points[ind].positions)
476  if pose_i is None:
477  pose_i = RobotState()
478  dist_pose_to_target = dist_2_poses(reference_pos, pose_i)
479 
480  if dist_pose_to_target > dist_smooth:
481  return ind
482  else:
483  if reverse:
484  return 0
485  else:
486  return len_plan - 1
487 
488  smooth_zones = []
489  offset = 0
490  for plan_in, plan_out in zip(plans[:-1], plans[1:]):
491  begin_index = offset + find_limit_point(plan_in, dist_smoothing, reverse=True)
492  offset += len(plan_in.joint_trajectory.points)
493  mid_index = offset
494  end_index = mid_index + find_limit_point(plan_out, dist_smoothing, reverse=False)
495  smooth_zones.append((begin_index, mid_index, end_index))
496 
497  big_plan = plans[0]
498  for plan in plans[1:]:
499  big_plan.joint_trajectory.points.extend(plan.joint_trajectory.points[:])
500 
501  def ind_to_pos(ind):
502  return np.array(big_plan.joint_trajectory.points[ind].positions)
503 
504  def bezier(p0, p1, p2, t):
505  return ((1 - t)**2) * p0 + 2 * (1 - t) * t * p1 + (t**2) * p2
506 
507  for smooth_zone in smooth_zones:
508  begin_index, mid_index, end_index = smooth_zone
509  begin_positions, mid_positions, end_positions = map(ind_to_pos, [begin_index, mid_index, end_index])
510  for point_index in range(begin_index + 1, end_index):
511  ratio = float(point_index - begin_index) / (end_index - begin_index)
512  bezier_result = bezier(begin_positions, mid_positions, end_positions, ratio)
513  big_plan.joint_trajectory.points[point_index].positions = bezier_result
514 
515  final_plan = self.__traj_executor.retime_plan(
516  big_plan,
517  optimize=True,
518  velocity_scaling_factor=self.__arm_state.velocity_scaling_factor,
519  acceleration_scaling_factor=self.__arm_state.acceleration_scaling_factor,
520  )
521  return final_plan
522 
523  # - General Purposes
524  def display_traj(self, plan, id_=1):
525  if rospy.get_param("~display_trajectories"):
526  points = []
527  for joints in plan.joint_trajectory.points:
528  forward_kinematics = self.__kinematics_handler.get_forward_kinematics(joints.positions)
529  if forward_kinematics is None:
530  forward_kinematics = RobotState()
531  points.append(forward_kinematics.position)
532  self.__traj_executor.display_traj(points, id_)
533 
534  def __validate_params_move(self, command_type, *args):
535  """
536  Validate parameters according to command_type
537  The function will raise an error if command is not valid
538  :param command_type:
539  :type command_type: ArmMoveCommand
540  :param args: parameters
541  :return: None
542  """
543  if command_type == ArmMoveCommand.JOINTS:
544  self.__parameters_validator.validate_joints(args[0])
545  elif command_type == ArmMoveCommand.POSE:
546  self.__parameters_validator.validate_position(args[0])
547  self.__parameters_validator.validate_orientation(args[1])
548  elif command_type == ArmMoveCommand.POSITION:
549  self.__parameters_validator.validate_position(args[0])
550  elif command_type == ArmMoveCommand.RPY:
551  self.__parameters_validator.validate_orientation(args[0])
552  elif command_type in [
553  ArmMoveCommand.EXECUTE_TRAJ,
554  ArmMoveCommand.EXECUTE_FULL_TRAJ,
555  ]:
556  self.__parameters_validator.validate_trajectory(args[0])
557  elif command_type == ArmMoveCommand.POSE_QUAT:
558  self.__parameters_validator.validate_position(args[0])
559  self.__parameters_validator.validate_orientation_quaternion(args[1])
560  elif command_type == ArmMoveCommand.SHIFT_POSE:
561  self.__parameters_validator.validate_shift_pose(args[0])
562  elif command_type == ArmMoveCommand.SHIFT_LINEAR_POSE:
563  self.__parameters_validator.validate_shift_pose(args[0])
564  else:
565  raise ArmCommanderException(CommandStatus.UNKNOWN_COMMAND, "Wrong command type")
566 
567  def __check_collision_in_joints_target(self, joints):
568  """
569  Check if the joints target implies a self collision. Raise an exception is a collision is detected.
570  :param joints: list of joints value
571  """
572  try:
573  robot_state_target = RobotStateMoveIt()
574  robot_state_target.joint_state.header.frame_id = "world"
575  robot_state_target.joint_state.position = joints
576  robot_state_target.joint_state.name = self.__joints_name
577  group_name = self.__arm.get_name()
578  response = self.__parameters_validator.check_state_validity(robot_state_target, group_name, None)
579  if not response.valid:
580  if len(response.contacts) > 0:
581  rospy.logwarn(
582  "Arm commander - Joints target unreachable because of collision between %s and %s",
583  response.contacts[0].contact_body_1,
584  response.contacts[0].contact_body_2,
585  )
586  raise ArmCommanderException(
587  CommandStatus.INVALID_PARAMETERS,
588  "Target joints would lead to a collision between links {} and {} ".format(
589  response.contacts[0].contact_body_1,
590  response.contacts[0].contact_body_2,
591  ),
592  )
593  else: # didn't succeed to get the contacts on the real robot
594  rospy.logwarn(
595  "Arm commander - Joints target unreachable because of collision between two parts of Ned")
596  raise ArmCommanderException(
597  CommandStatus.INVALID_PARAMETERS,
598  "Target joints would lead to a collision between two parts of Ned",
599  )
600 
601  except rospy.ServiceException as e:
602  rospy.logwarn("Arm commander - Failed to check state validity : " + str(e))
603 
604  @property
605  def jog_controller(self):
606  return self.__jog_controller
